title: Devcon #6 - The Layer 2 Wars with Bartek Kiepuszewski
description:
Bartek is the founder of Layer 2 Beat, finding himself in the middle of what we’re calling the Layer 2 Wars. Previously at MakerDAO, Bartek is pioneering the one-stop platform for the Layer 2 landscape.
